description.narrative: Insatsen är en plan för policy dialog och kapacitetsutveckling för ukrainska myndigheter. Baserat på erfarenhet, pågående projekt och den ukrainska reform agendan har följande fem pelare valts ut: - Investeringsklimat – stöd till anti-korruptionsreformagendan är i fokus - Banksektorn – stöd för stabilisering av banksektorn och utveckling av kapitalmarknader - Energi – stöd till omstrukturering av statligt ägda företag och stöd till utarbetande och implementering av regelverk - Företagssektorn – ökad konkurrenskraft, utökning av handel och tillgång till krediter - Infrastruktur – stöd till institutionell kapacitet

The proposal from the EBRD, “EBRD-Ukraine Stabilisation and Sustainable Growth Multi-Donor Account (MDA)” has been developed in the light of the economic crisis that emerged as a result of the political conflict and the ensuing military conflict in the eastern part of Ukraine. This is an operational response to the new needs and transition opportunities and addresses the urgent needs as regards support for the design and implementation of policy reforms and institutional capacity building as well as investment support, all in agreement with the Ukrainian government and other public authorities. The programme offers short hand medium -term technical cooperation (TC), mostly consisting of policy dialogue and institutional capacity building, to different Ukrainian authorities.
Based on an appraisal of EBRD´s strengths, the Ukrainian priority agenda as well as the current donor setting including actors such as the World Bank, IMF and other International Financial Institutions (IFIs), the proposal focuses on the following pillars, with examples associated overall sectoral objectives and activities:
- Investment climate – where support to the anti-corruption reform agenda is particularly important - Banking sector – support to the stabilization of the banking sector and development of capital and money markets - Energy – support to the restructuring of state owned enterprises and support to the drafting and implementation of enabling legislative and regulatory frameworks - Corporate sector – increased competitiveness, expansion of trade and increased access to finance - Infrastructure – strengthen institutional capacity and support liberalization, assisting the implementation of transport reforms

participating-org.narrative: EBRD/European Bank for Reconstruction and Development
European Bank for Reconstruction and Development

tag.narrative: 8.3 - Främja utvecklingsinriktad politik som stöder produktiv verksamhet, skapande av anständiga arbetstillfällen, företagande, kreativitet och innovation samt uppmuntra att mikroföretag liksom små och medelstora företag växer och blir en del av den formella ekonomin, bland annat genom tillgång till finansiella tjänster.

8.3 - Promote development-oriented policies that support productive activities, decent job creation, entrepreneurship, creativity and innovation, and encourage the formalization and growth of micro-, small- and medium-sized enterprises, including through access to financial services.
